attributes.action:
BAN INCOMING FLIGHTS FROM CHINA, US, IRAN & EUROPE AND
QUARANTINE ALL OTHERS.
attributes.additional_details: We, In the UK, are all doing our part, self isolating and being ultra cautious and people, some infected, are just entering the UK, without tests, without quarantine and travelling on public transport, going shopping...its outrageous.  Close the flights down.
attributes.background: Ban all incoming flights from Europe, Iran, China, US and 14 day quarantine any other incoming travellers

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301188

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
